channel.title: CVE Feed for Nathan Vonnahme -- Configure Login Timeout

item.title: CVE-2024-34419|2024-05-09T11:31:05.297Z -- Nathan Vonnahme -- Configure Login Timeout
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nathan Vonnahme Configure Login Timeout allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Configure Login Timeout: from n/a through 1.0.
